title.narrative: Reform of the sustainable UN financing strategy for the implementation of the 2030 Agenda and the Paris Agreement

description.narrative: The Paris Agreement and the 2030 Agenda set the course for a sustainable, low-carbon and climate-neutral global economy. The necessary structural change in the real economy is only possible with a financial sector that supports the goals of both agreements. This requires robust international development and financial organizations such as the UN, the International Monetary Fund and the World Bank, as well as adapting their mandates and working methods. The project supports the UN General Secretariat, in particular with the development of a strategy for financing the 2030 Agenda and strengthens its participation in the international economic and financial forums. It also helps UN organizations to implement financing issues as part of the “One UN approach to member states”. The project is also launching flagship initiatives on future mega-topics and trends in the financial sector and spreading the sustainable financing approach internationally.
